message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,750,000. It's a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you'll find it incredibly valuable.  Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $1,600,000. I hope this revised offer is acceptable to you.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping for a bit more to make this deal work. I'm willing to come down to $1,650,000. Let's see if we can find common ground.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,625,000. I believe this is a fair compromise given the value of the product.
